sentences.english: I see your image in the water.
After that, I liked watching her ride ahead of me.

sentences.english: The beautiful sparse shadows of the arching willows were like a picture etched on the lotus leaves .

sentences.english: Let me use this with tears in her eyes, bring you again recorded in the depths of the soul.

sentences.english: Even if I can't find its silhouette , still I can recall some recollection in my mind.

I also see your lovable beautiful figure in the sleep.
sentences.chinese: 我還在睡夢中見到你可愛的倩影。

definition: (literary) (of a woman) to have a graceful demeanor/beautiful woman
sweet, fair, and graceful (of a woman)/a seductive woman/secluded (bower)
to sway gently (as in the wind)/(of a flame) to flicker
gleaming reflection of waves in sunlight
